trans-unit.source: Provides a simple way to create and manage the contents of connection strings used by the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Er en enkel måte å opprette og administrere innholdet i tilkoblingsstrenger som brukes av den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Denne typen er avskrevet og vil bli fjernet i en fremtidig versjon av .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Oracle og ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The connection string builders allow developers to programmatically create syntactically correct connection strings, and to parse and rebuild existing connection strings, using properties and methods of the class.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingsstreng verktøy tillater utviklere å opprette programmatisk syntaktisk korrigere tilkoblingsstrenger, og til å analysere og Bygg eksisterende tilkobling strenger, ved hjelp av egenskaper og metoder for klassen.

trans-unit.source: The connection string builder provides strongly typed properties corresponding to the known key/value pairs allowed by Oracle.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingsstreng builder inneholder forespørselsparameter av sterk type egenskaper tilsvarer kjente nøkkel/verdi-parene som tillates av Oracle.

trans-unit.source: The OracleConnectionStringBuilder class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
trans-unit.target: OracleConnectionStringBuilder klassen implementerer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>grensesnittet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: This means that the class works with Visual Studio .NET designers at design time.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at klassen fungerer med Visual Studio .NET utviklere under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: When developers use the designer to build strongly typed **DataSets** and strongly typed connections within Visual Studio .NET, the strongly typed connection string builder class will display the properties associated with its type and will also have converters that can map common values for known keys.
trans-unit.target: Utviklere bruke når designer for å bygge sterkt skrevet **datasett** og sterk tilkoblinger i Visual Studio .NET, forespørselsparameter av sterk type tilkoblingsstreng builder klassen viser egenskaper som er tilknyttet filtypen vil også ha konverteringsprogrammer som kan tilordnes vanlige verdier for kjent nøkler.

trans-unit.source: Developers needing to create connection strings as part of applications can use the OracleConnectionStringBuilder class to build and modify connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Utviklere behov for å opprette tilkoblingsstrenger som en del av programmer kan bruke klassen OracleConnectionStringBuilder du bygger og endre tilkoblingsstrengene.

trans-unit.source: The OracleConnectionStringBuilder class also makes it easy to manage connection strings stored in an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Klassen OracleConnectionStringBuilder gjør det også enkelt administrere tilkoblingsstrenger, er lagret i en programkonfigurasjonsfilen.

trans-unit.source: The OracleConnectionStringBuilder performs checks for valid key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: OracleConnectionStringBuilder utfører kontroller gyldig nøkkel/verdi-par.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this class cannot be used to create invalid connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan derfor ikke brukes til å opprette tilkoblingsstrenger, er ugyldig.

trans-unit.source: Trying to add invalid pairs will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Prøver å legge til ugyldig par vil Iverksett et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The OracleConnectionStringBuilder class maintains a fixed collection of synonyms, and when required, can perform the required translation to convert from a synonym to the corresponding well-known key name.
trans-unit.target: Klassen OracleConnectionStringBuilder opprettholder en fast samling av synonymer, og ved behov, kan utføre nødvendige oversettelsen konvertere fra et synonym til de tilsvarende velkjente nøkkelnavnet.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> property to retrieve a value, you can specify a string that contains any synonym for the key you need.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel når du bruker den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>til å hente en verdi, kan du angi en streng som inneholder alle synonym for nøkkelen må.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> property for a full list of acceptable synonyms.
trans-unit.target: Se den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>egenskapen for en fullstendig liste over godkjente synonymer.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OracleConnectionStringBuilder handles attempts to insert malicious entries.
trans-unit.target: OracleConnectionStringBuilder behandler forsøk på å sette inn skadelig oppføringer.

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code, using the default <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> property (the indexer, in C#) correctly escapes the nested key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel følgende kode, ved hjelp av standard <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>egenskapen (indeksering, i C#) escapes riktig nestede nøkkel/verdi-paret.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim builder As New System.Data. _ OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder builder("Data Source") = "OracleDemo" builder("Integrated Security") = True builder("User ID") = "Mary;NewValue=Bad" System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString) ``` [C#] ``` System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder(); builder["Data Source"] = "OracleDemo"; builder["integrated Security"] = true; builder["User ID"] = "Mary;NewValue=Bad"; System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString); ``` The result is the following connection string that handles the invalid value in a safe manner by enclosing the User ID value in quotes: ``` Data Source=OracleDemo;Integrated Security=True;User ID="Mary;NewValue=Bad" ```
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim builder As New System.Data. _ OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder builder("Data Source") = "OracleDemo" builder("Integrated Security") = True builder("User ID") = "Mary;NewValue=Bad" System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString) ``` [C#] ``` System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder(); builder["Data Source"] = "OracleDemo"; builder["integrated Security"] = true; builder["User ID"] = "Mary;NewValue=Bad"; System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(builder.ConnectionString); ``` resultatet er følgende tilkoblingsstrengen som behandler den ugyldige verdien på en sikker måte ved å sette verdien bruker-ID i anførselstegn:``` Data Source=OracleDemo;Integrated Security=True;User ID="Mary;NewValue=Bad" ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The provided connection string provides the data for the instance's internal connection information.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte tilkoblingsstrengen er dataene for den forekomsten intern tilkoblingsinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> class provides a fixed internal collection of key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>klassen inneholder en fast intern samling nøkkel/verdi-par.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Even if you supply only a small subset of the possible connection string values in the constructor, the object always provides default values for each key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: Selv om du oppgi undergruppe av mulig tilkoblingen strengverdier i konstruktøren, gir objektet alltid standardverdier for hvert nøkkel/verdi-par.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property of the object is retrieved, the string contains only key/value pairs in which the value is different from the default value for the item.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ConnectionString%2A>for objektet som hentes, strengen inneholder bare nøkkel/verdi-par der verdien som er forskjellig fra verdien for elementet.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.ConnectionString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The basis for the object's internal connection information.
trans-unit.target: Grunnlag for objektets intern tilkoblingsinformasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Parsed into name/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: Analyseres til navn/verdi-par.

trans-unit.source: Invalid key names raise a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException>.
trans-unit.target: Ugyldig nøkkelnavn heve <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException>.</xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException>

trans-unit.source: Invalid key name within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Ugyldig nøkkelnavn i tilkoblingsstrengen.

trans-unit.source: Invalid value within the connection string (specifically, when a Boolean or numeric value was expected but not supplied).
trans-unit.target: Ugyldig verdi i tilkoblingsstrengen (det vil si når en boolsk eller en numerisk verdi var ventet, men ikke angitt).

trans-unit.source: Clears the contents of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner innholdet på den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The Clear method removes all key/value pairs from the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>, and resets all corresponding properties.
trans-unit.target: Fjern for fjerner alle nøkkel/verdi-par fra den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>, og tilbakestiller alle tilhørende egenskaper.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This includes resetting the connection string to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Dette omfatter tilbakestille tilkoblingsstrengen til en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> contains a specific key.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> inneholder en bestemt nøkkel.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> contains a fixed-size collection of key/value pairs, the ContainsKey method determines only if a particular key name is valid.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>inneholder en fast størrelse samling av nøkkel/verdi-par, ContainsKey metoden bestemmer om en bestemt Nøkkelnavn er gyldig.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The key to locate in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen for å finne i den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> contains an element that has the specified key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> inneholder et element med den angitte nøkkelen; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: keyword is null ( in Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: keyworder null ( i Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the Oracle data source to connect to.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på Oracle-datakilden til å koble til.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Data Source" and "Server" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen tilsvarer "Datakilde" og "Server" nøklene i tilkoblingsstrengen.

trans-unit.source: Regardless of which of these values has been supplied within the supplied connection string, the connection string created by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> will use the well-known "Data Source" key.
trans-unit.target: Uansett hvilket av disse verdiene er angitt i den angitte tilkoblingsstrengen, tilkoblingsstrengen som er opprettet av den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>vil bruke den kjente "Datakilden"-nøkkelen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the DataSource property is reset.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien sendt null når du prøver å angi egenskapen, tilbakestiller egenskapen DataSource.

trans-unit.source: If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien ikke er angitt og utvikleren prøver å hente egenskapen, er returverdien <xref:System.String.Empty>.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: The value of the DataSource property, or <xref:System.String> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen DataSource eller <xref:System.String>Hvis ingen er angitt.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the pooler automatically enlists the connection in the creation thread's current transaction context.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om pooler automatisk innrullerer tilkoblingen i oppretting trådens Transaksjonskonteksten.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Enlist" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen samsvarer med nøkkelen "Enlist" i tilkoblingsstrengen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Enlist property, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property has not been previously set.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen Enlist eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> Hvis egenskapen ikke er allerede er angitt.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether "User ID" and "Password" are specified in the connection (when <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>) or whether the current Windows account credentials are used for authentication (when <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om bruker-ID"og"Passord"er angitt i tilkoblingen (når <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>) eller om de gjeldende Windows-kontolegitimasjonen, brukes for godkjenning (når <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>).

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Integrated Security" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen samsvarer med nøkkelen "Integrert sikkerhet" i tilkoblingsstrengen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the IntegratedSecurity property, or a <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen IntegratedSecurity eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis ingen er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> har en fast størrelse.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in every case, because the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> supplies a fixed-size collection of key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>i hvert fall fordi den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> leverer en fast størrelse samling nøkkel/verdi-par.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value associated with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien som er forbundet med den angitte nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er indeksering i C#.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> contains a fixed-size dictionary, trying to add a key that does not exist within the dictionary throws a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException>.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>inneholder en fast størrelse ordliste, prøver å legge til en nøkkel som ikke finnes i ordlisten oppstår <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException>.</xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists all the possible keys within the connection string, and the default value for each.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser alle mulige nøkler i tilkoblingsstrengen, og standardverdien for hver.

trans-unit.source: |Key|Property|Default value| |---------|--------------|-------------------| |Data Source (or server)|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource%2A>|Empty string| |Persist Security Info (or persistsecurityinfo)|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.PersistSecurityInfo%2A>|False| |Integrated Security|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.IntegratedSecurity%2A>|False| |User ID (or user or uid)|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.UserID%2A>|Empty string| |Password|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Password%2A>|Empty string| |Enlist|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Enlist%2A>|True| |Pooling|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Pooling%2A>|True| |Min Pool Size|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.MinPoolSize%2A>|0| |Max Pool Size|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.MaxPoolSize%2A>|100| |Omit Oracle Connection Name|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.OmitOracleConnectionName%2A>|False| |Unicode|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Unicode%2A>|False| |Load Balance Timeout (or connection lifetime)|<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.LoadBalanceTimeout%2A>|0|
trans-unit.target: | Nøkkelen | Egenskapen | Standardverdien | |---------|--------------|-------------------| | Datakilden (eller server) | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource%2A>| Tom streng | | Beholde sikkerhetsinformasjonen (eller persistsecurityinfo) | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.PersistSecurityInfo%2A>| False | | Integrert sikkerhet | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.IntegratedSecurity%2A>| False | | Bruker-IDen (eller brukeren eller uid) | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.UserID%2A>| Tom streng | | Passord | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Password%2A>| Tom streng | | Registrere | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Enlist%2A>| True | | Pooling | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Pooling%2A>| True | | Størrelse for tilkoblingsutvalg for Min | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.MinPoolSize%2A>|0| | Størrelse for tilkoblingsutvalg for Max | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.MaxPoolSize%2A>|&100; | | Utelat Oracle-tilkoblingsnavnet | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.OmitOracleConnectionName%2A>| False | | Unicode | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Unicode%2A>| False | | Laste inn saldo tidsavbrudd (eller levetid for tilkobling) | <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.LoadBalanceTimeout%2A>|0|</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.LoadBalanceTimeout%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Unicode%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.OmitOracleConnectionName%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.MaxPoolSize%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.MinPoolSize%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Pooling%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Enlist%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Password%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.UserID%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.IntegratedSecurity%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.PersistSecurityInfo%2A></xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key of the item to get or set.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen for element for å hente eller angi.

trans-unit.source: The value associated with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er knyttet til den angitte nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: keyword is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: keyworder en nullreferanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Tried to add a key which does not exist within the available keys.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte å legge til en nøkkel som ikke finnes i de tilgjengelige nøklene.

trans-unit.source: Invalid value within the connection string (specifically, when a Boolean or numeric value was expected but not supplied).
trans-unit.target: Ugyldig verdi i tilkoblingsstrengen (det vil si når en boolsk eller en numerisk verdi var ventet, men ikke angitt).

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the keys in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>som inneholder nøklene i den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The order of the values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> returned by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Rekkefølgen på verdiene i den <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>er ikke angitt, men det er den samme rekkefølgen som de tilhørende verdiene i den <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>returnert av den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the keys in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>som inneholder nøklene i den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum time, in seconds, for the connection to live in the connection pool before it is removed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir minimum tiden i sekunder for tilkoblingen til live i tilkoblingsutvalget før det fjernes.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Load Balance Timeout" and "Connection Lifetime" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen tilsvarer "Saldo tidsavbrudd for Datainnlasting" og "Levetid for tilkobling" nøklene i tilkoblingsstrengen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the LoadBalanceTimeout property, or 0 if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen LoadBalanceTimeout eller 0 Hvis ingen er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of connections allowed in the connection pool for this specific connection string.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir maksimalt antall tillatte tilkoblinger i tilkoblingsutvalget for denne typespesifikk tilkoblingsstreng.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Max Pool Size" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen samsvarer med nøkkelen "Maksimal størrelse for tilkoblingsutvalg for" i tilkoblingsstrengen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the MaxPoolSize property, or 100 if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen MaxPoolSize eller 100 hvis ingen er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum number of connections allowed in the connection pool for this specific connection string.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir minimum antall tillatte tilkoblinger i tilkoblingsutvalget for denne typespesifikk tilkoblingsstreng.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Min Pool Size" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen samsvarer med nøkkelen "minimumsstørrelse for tilkoblingsutvalg for" i tilkoblingsstrengen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the MinPoolSize property, or 0 if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen MinPoolSize eller 0 Hvis ingen er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flag that enables transaction rollbacks on earlier versions of Oracle (prior to 8.1.7.4.1).
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir flagget som gjør det mulig for transaksjonen tilbakefører på tidligere versjoner av Oracle (før 8.1.7.4.1).

trans-unit.source: When set to `true`, this property prevents certain errors from occurring when attempting to roll back transactions in earlier versions of Oracle (prior to 8.1.7.4.1).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du velger `true`, denne egenskapen hindrer at enkelte feil oppstod under forsøk på å rulle tilbake transaksjoner i tidligere versjoner av Oracle (før 8.1.7.4.1).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if transaction rollbacks are enabled; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis transaksjonen tilbakefører er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the password for the Oracle account.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir passordet for Oracle-kontoen.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Password" and "pwd" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen tilsvarer "Passord" og "pwd" nøklene i tilkoblingsstrengen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Password property, or <xref:System.String> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen passord eller <xref:System.String>Hvis ingen er angitt.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates if security-sensitive information, such as the password, is not returned as part of the connection if the connection is open or has ever been in an open state.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en boolsk verdi som angir om blir sikkerhetsfølsom informasjon, for eksempel passordet, ikke returnert som en del av tilkoblingen hvis tilkoblingen er åpen eller har vært i en åpen tilstand.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Persist Security Info" and "persistsecurityinfo" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen tilsvarer "Beholde sikkerhetsinformasjonen" og "persistsecurityinfo" nøklene i tilkoblingsstrengen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the PersistSecurityInfo property, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen PersistSecurityInfo eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis ingen er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the connection will be pooled, or whether each connection will be explicitly opened every time that the connection is requested.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en boolsk verdi som angir om tilkoblingen skal være utvalg, eller om hver tilkobling vil eksplisitt åpnes hver gang tilkoblingen forespørres.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Pooling" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen samsvarer med nøkkelen "Pooling" i tilkoblingsstrengen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Pooling property, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_true " name="true " href=""></xref>if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen Pooling eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_true " name="true " href=""> </xref>Hvis ingen er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Removes the entry with the specified key from the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner posten med den angitte nøkkelen fra den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Because the Remove method returns a value that indicates its success, it is not necessary to look for the existence of a key before trying to remove the key/value pair from the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> instance.
trans-unit.target: Fordi Remove-metoden returnerer en verdi som angir hvor vellykket, er det ikke nødvendig for å se om finnes en nøkkel før du prøver å fjerne nøkkel/verdi-paret fra den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>forekomsten.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> maintains a fixed-size collection of key/value pairs, calling the Remove method just resets the value of the key/value pair back to its default value.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>opprettholder en fast størrelse samling nøkkel/verdi-par, kaller Remove-metoden bare tilbakestillinger verdien for nøkkel/verdi-paret tilbake til standardverdien.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Because the collection of keys supported by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> is fixed, every item within the collection has a known default value.
trans-unit.target: Fordi samlingen av nøkler støttes av den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>er løst, alle elementer i samlingen har en kjent standardverdi.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the keys, and the value for each when the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> is first initialized, or after the Remove method has been called: |Key|Default value| |---------|-------------------| |Data Source|Empty string| |Persist Security Info|False| |Integrated Security|False| |User ID|Empty string| |Password|Empty string| |Enlist|True| |Pooling|True| |Min Pool Size|0| |Max Pool Size|100| |Unicode|False| |Load Balance Timeout|0| |Omit Oracle Connection Name|False|
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser nøklene og verdien for hver når <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>blir initialisert eller etter Remove-metoden er kalt: | Nøkkelen | Standardverdien | |---------|-------------------| | Datakilden | Tom streng | | Beholde sikkerhetsinformasjonen | False | | Integrert sikkerhet | False | | Bruker-IDen | Tom streng | | Passord | Tom streng | | Registrere | True | | Pooling | True | | Størrelse for tilkoblingsutvalg for Min |&0; | | Størrelse for tilkoblingsutvalg for Max |&100; | | Unicode | False | | Laste saldo tidsavbrudd |&0; | | Utelat Oracle-tilkoblingsnavnet | False |</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The key of the key/value pair to be removed from the connection string in this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen for nøkkel/verdi-paret vil bli fjernet fra tilkoblingsstrengen i dette <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key existed within the connection string and was removed, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the key did not exist.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis nøkkelen fantes i tilkoblingsstrengen som er fjernet, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis nøkkelen ikke finnes.

trans-unit.source: keyword is null ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: keyworder null ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified key exists in this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den angitte nøkkelen finnes i dette <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: This method behaves identically to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden fungerer identisk til den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key to locate in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen for å finne i den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> contains an entry with the specified key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> inneholder en post med den angitte nøkkelen; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value corresponding to the supplied key from this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som tilsvarer den angitte nøkkelen fra dette <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The TryGetValue method lets developers safely retrieve a value from an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> without needing to verify that the supplied key name is a valid key name.
trans-unit.target: Metoden TryGetValue kan utviklere trygt å hente en verdi fra en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>uten å måtte Kontroller at det angitte navnet er et gyldig nøkkelnavn.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Because TryGetValue gracefully handles searching for a non-existent key, there is no need to look for the existence of a key before retrieving its value.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen grunn til å se om finnes en nøkkel før henting av verdien fordi TryGetValue håndterer webområdet søker etter en ikke-eksisterende nøkkel.

trans-unit.source: Calling TryGetValue with a nonexistent key will place the value null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Kaller TryGetValue med en ikke-eksisterende nøkkel setter verdien null (`Nothing` i Visual Basic) i den `value` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: The key of the item to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen for elementet som skal hentes.

trans-unit.source: The value corresponding to `keyword.`
trans-unit.target: Verdien som tilsvarer`keyword.`

trans-unit.source: if keyword was found within the connection string; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis keyword ble funnet i tilkoblingsstrengen; ellers, .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates if the client supports the Unicode functionality available in later Oracle clients, or if it is non-Unicode aware.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en boolsk verdi som angir hvis klienten støtter Unicode-funksjonene som er tilgjengelige i senere Oracle-klienter, eller hvis den ikke-Unicode bruker.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "Unicode" key within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen samsvarer med nøkkelen "Unicode" i tilkoblingsstrengen.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Unicode property, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false " name="false " href=""></xref>if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen Unicode eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_false " name="false " href=""> </xref>Hvis ingen er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user ID to be used when connecting to Oracle.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bruker-IDen som skal brukes ved tilkobling til Oracle.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the "User ID", "user", and "uid" keys within the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen svarer til bruker-ID","bruker"og"uid"nøklene i tilkoblingsstrengen.

trans-unit.source: If the value passed in is null when you try to set the property, the UserID property is reset.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien innsendte null når du prøver å angi egenskapen, tilbakestiller bruker-ID-egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: If the value has not been set and the developer tries to retrieve the property, the return value is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien ikke er angitt og utvikleren prøver å hente egenskapen, er returverdien <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The value of the UserID property, or <xref:System.String> if none has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen UserID eller <xref:System.String>Hvis ingen er angitt.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the values in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>som inneholder verdiene i den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The order of the values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated keys in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> returned by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Rekkefølgen på verdiene i den <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>er ikke angitt, men det er den samme rekkefølgen som de tilknyttede nøklene i den <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>returnert av den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Keys%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder.Keys%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Because each instance of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> always contains the same fixed set of keys, the Values property always returns the values corresponding to the fixed set of keys, in the same order as the keys.
trans-unit.target: Fordi hver forekomst av den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>inneholder alltid det samme faste settet med nøkler, verdiene egenskapen returnerer alltid verdier som svarer til fast settet med nøkler, i samme rekkefølge som nøklene.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the values in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>som inneholder verdiene i den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>
